summary: Changes the slots of the equipable horns to slot 55, you can wear with other normal head gear.
descriptionHtml:
Wanted to wear the horns with a helm so I could get the effects of armor perks. Not a pro with creation kit or nifskope for that matter. Anyhow, this uploaded for those are lazy or unable to make changes themselves. If you have other mods that have items that use slot 55 equipping will cause conflict.

I did not test all the horns, but they should all be moved to slot 55.
Add beast support, seems to work - I don't play the beast races so there could be issues.

So just leave a message if I missed one or something isn't right.

I did get permission to upload this from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4267357]TheDNightshade[/url]. You will need the original mod, this will not work with language packs provided there, to install overwrite all.

Want more choices in horns? This [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65401/?]mod [/url]includes three mods worth of horns, and a stand alone version of this one.
author: EleteGuard

files.name: TDN horns Non head Slot with Beast Support
